title: _tomcc : 0.13.0已经提交给App Store
author: 呆瓜Domado
txt_content:
本帖最后由 2641324669 于 2015-11-18 22:07 编辑 

Tommaso Checchi @_tomcc


By the way, it might be that 0.13 has been submitted to Apple a while ago :)

顺便跟你们说一下，0.13.0我已经在之前提交给Apple审核[*1]了 :)

[注解]*1.Apple 就是"苹果公司"，不是可以吃的苹果！
